programme.title: Pas son genre
programme.desc: Clément Le Guern vient de quitter sa compagne. Auteur d'essais reconnu et professeur de philosophie, Clément, très parisien, apprend avec effroi qu'il est muté à Arras. Heureusement pour lui, son emploi du temps lui permet de passer la moitié de sa semaine à Paris. Mais, dans un salon de coiffure d'Arras, il rencontre Jennifer, qui s'occupe de lui. Clément est sous le charme de cette jeune femme qui lui résiste.

programme.title: Dans Paris
programme.desc: Paul, 30 ans, rompt avec Anna et retourne quelques jours chez son père pour passer ce cap difficile. Son frère Jonathan, jeune homme insouciant, encore étudiant, tente de le sortir de sa déprime. Au cours d'une seule journée ponctuée de diverses rencontres, la famille, y compris la mère qui avait quitté son mari depuis plusieurs années, va se ressouder pour aider Paul à oublier ses pensées suicidaires.

programme.title: Fini de jouer
programme.desc: A 32 ans, Abe Applebaum n'est plus que l'ombre de ce qu'il a été. Détective prodige dès l'âge de 13 ans, le jeune homme a connu une certaine notoriété avant de déchoir sévèrement. Désormais légèrement alcoolique, Abe, 32 ans, vit toujours dans la ville pavillonnaire de Willowbrook, sous le regard navré de ses parents et en est réduit à traiter des affaires mineures, souvent très mal rémunérées. Tout change quand Caroline, une de ses anciennes clientes, vient le voir pour l'aider à résoudre le meurtre de son petit ami, tué de 17 coups de couteaux.

programme.title: Fugazi
programme.desc: Depuis plus de trois ans, Adèle travaille sur ORBIT, une station spatiale chargée du pilotage des drones sur la planète Terre. Aujourd'hui, tenant entre ses mains deux joysticks, il ne lui reste plus qu'une mission de routine à accomplir pour rejoindre enfin sa famille. A moins qu'un grain de sable ne fasse basculer son destin..

programme.title: Music
programme.desc: Atteinte de troubles autistiques, la jeune Music vit avec sa grand-mère. S’échappant dans un monde de rêve, Music mène par ailleurs une existence pleine de rituels. Un jour, sa grand-mère meurt. La jeune fille est alors confiée à sa demi-soeur, Zu, une toxicomane récemment sortie de cure. Cette dernière ne sait pas bien comment s’y prendre et commet des maladresses. Lors d’une crise de Music, Ebo, un voisin, propose son aide à Zu. il sait comment calmer l’adolescente. Et Zu trouve un livre laissé par sa grand-mère qui détaille la routine quotidienne de Music.

programme.title: Hashtag Boomer
programme.sub-title: S1 E1 On ne choisit pas sa famille

programme.title: Hashtag Boomer
programme.sub-title: S1 E2 Maman, 12 appels manqués, 6 mémos, 3 textos

programme.title: American Pie
programme.desc: Jim, Oz, Kevin et Finch, quatre copains, décident de perdre leur virginité avant de commencer la fac. Chacun a sa méthode. Jim jette son dévolu sur Nadia, tandis qu'Oz entre dans la chorale pour séduire la prude Heather. Kevin veut convaincre sa petite amie Vicky au moyen d'une «bible» sur les plaisirs du sexe. Finch se fait passer pour un «supermâle». Toutes les filles veulent alors être sa cavalière au bal de la promo.

programme.title: American Pie 2
programme.desc: Jim, Oz, Kevin et Finch, quatre jeunes amis, entendent profiter dignement de leurs vacances. Ils louent une maison sur le bord du lac Michigan. Alors que Nadia doit rejoindre Jim à la fin de l'été, ce dernier retrouve Michelle, une flûtiste délurée auprès de laquelle il a beaucoup de choses à apprendre. Quant à Finch, il se prépare à une nouvelle rencontre avec la mère de Stiffler.

programme.title: The Unusual Suspects
programme.desc: Sara, Evie, Roxanne, Amy et Birdie suivent les conseils de Rae pour mettre au point un plan solide pour s'emparer d'un collier qui vaut près de 16 millions de dollars.

programme.title: The Unusual Suspects
programme.desc: Evie et ses comparses découvrent qu'elles ont finalement été doublées, un mystérieux voleur s'est emparé du collier. En outre, la police est sur leurs traces.

programme.title: American Pie : marions-les !
programme.desc: Sous le regard aimant de son papa, Jim s'est décidé à demander Michelle en mariage. Ravi que celle-ci ait accepté, il souhaite lui organiser une fête inoubliable. Mais le chemin jusqu'à l'autel s'annonce semé d'embuches pour le jeune homme. Entre son enterrement de vie de garçon avec ses amis illuminés, la présentation des deux familles et la pression du jour J, il va en voir de toutes les couleurs.

programme.title: American Pie 4
programme.desc: Treize ans après leur diplôme, Jim et ses amis ont bien changé. Le jeune homme est aujourd'hui marié avec Michelle. Ils ont un petit garçon et des obligations qui nuisent à leur vie sexuelle. Oz et Kevin sont également en couple alors que Finch cherche toujours le grand amour. Tous se réunissent le temps d'un week-end pour participer à une réunion d'anciens du lycée. Évidemment, l'encombrant Stifler ne tarde pas à débarquer.

programme.title: L'ivresse du pouvoir
programme.desc: Jeanne Charmant-Killman, juge à Paris, instruit une délicate affaire touchant aux milieux politiques et industriels. D'emblée, elle fait incarcérer pour détournement de fonds Michel Humeau, le président d'un puissant groupe industriel public qu’elle commence à interroger avec acharnement. Comme les autres personnes impliquées, Humeau reste muet. Jeanne se voit adjoindre une seconde magistrate avec qui elle travaille en bonne intelligence. Bientôt, les pressions pour la stopper vont s'intensifiant. Jeanne, incorruptible, se sent de plus en plus menacée.

programme.title: Shock Wave 2
programme.desc: Poon Shing Fung et Tung Cheuk Man, deux brillants officiers artificiers de la police de Hongkong, sont appelés sur de périlleuses opérations de déminage. A cours de l'une d'entre elles, Shing Fung se trouve pris dans le feu d'une violente explosion, le laissant amputé d'une jambe. Désormais aidé d'une prothèse et déterminé à retrouver sa mobilité, Poon suit un programme sportif intensif, mais quitte la police. Cinq ans plus tard, un jeune homme muni d'une ceinture d'explosif commet un attentat meurtrier dans un immeuble de la ville. Selon toute vraisemblance, il appartient à un mouvement terroriste.

programme.title: Austin Powers
programme.desc: En 1967, à Londres, Austin Powers est un photographe de mode adulé des femmes et jalousé des hommes. Plus discrètement, il est aussi le meilleur agent secret au service de Sa Majesté. Un soir, son ennemi juré, le diabolique docteur Denfer, parvient à lui échapper à bord d'une fusée spatiale et ne trouve rien de mieux à faire que de se congeler. Son but ? Revenir terroriser le monde trente ans plus tard. Austin Powers décide d'en faire de même. En 1997, les deux adversaires reviennent à la vie et s'affrontent à nouveau dans un monde qui a beaucoup changé.

programme.title: Nicky Larson Private Eyes
programme.desc: Au cours d'une de ses missions en plein coeur du quartier animé de Shinjuku, à Tokyo, Nicky Larson est pris dans une fusillade qui sème destruction et confusion aux alentours. Au même moment, Frank Carter, le père d'Iris Woods meurt dans un étrange accident de voiture. La jeune femme, qui se sent depuis menacée, fait appel à l'agence de Nicky et Laura pour assurer sa sécurité. La jeune femme, célèbre top model, emmène les deux détectives à l'une de ses séances de photo. C'est là qu'il croisent le chemin de Christopher King, patron de la florissante société Dominatech. Mais King est également un ancien camarade de collège de Laura.

programme.title: Les cobayes
programme.desc: Le laboratoire pharmaceutique Biothema vient de mettre au point un traitement, intitulé Ocy 36, qui influe sur les sentiments de ses sujets. Après plusieurs phases d'essais concluants, la laboratoire fait appel à des cobayes humains pour la dernière phase de tests. Adam, chercheur en sciences sociales, et Charlotte, cadre dans une grande entreprise, en couple depuis le lycée et parents d'un petit Basile, se portent volontaires, en espérant que ce traitement sauvera leur couple. Tous deux commencent le traitement, mais celui-ci ne montre pas de résultats immédiats.

programme.title: Night Call
programme.desc: A Los Angeles, Lou Bloom, criminel qui vit d'expédients, découvre le travail des cameramen, à la recherche d'images explosives. Il s'en procure une et décide de se mettre à son compte. Ses moyens et son matériel sont très limités et ses premiers essais sont hasardeux mais Lou persévère. Il veut se faire une place dans le métier et impressionner Nina Romina, directrice de l'information de Channel 6, une chaine de télévision locale.

programme.title: L'élève Ducobu
programme.desc: L'élève Ducobu n'aime pas l'école. Pour la énième fois, il s'est fait renvoyer et doit s'inscrire dans un nouvel établissement. Le premier jour, il y fait la connaissance de ses camarades, dont la jeune Léonie Gratin, première de la classe. Il rencontre aussi son professeur, le strict et colérique monsieur Latouche. Spécialiste de la triche, Ducobu parvient pour une fois à se faire passer pour un bon élève.

programme.title: Les vacances de Ducobu
programme.desc: Ravi de partir en vacances avec son père, Ducobu déchante. Il se retrouve en effet dans le même camping que Léonie, la meilleure élève de l'école. Son instituteur, monsieur Latouche, y passe lui aussi son été. Lors d'une sortie, Ducobu apprend qu'un trésor est caché dans une île voisine. Il est persuadé de pouvoir le découvrir. De son côté, Latouche est terriblement jaloux d'Esteban, l'animateur du club d'enfants.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3
programme.desc: Les Bellas, une chorale a cappella de filles, viennent d'obtenir leur diplôme et rêvent d'un avenir prometteur, plein de belles opportunités. Mais les offres de travail sont peu nombreuses. Lors d'une soirée, Aubrey, la fille d'un militaire haut placé, parle aux autres membres du groupe d'un concert organisé en Espagne en soutien aux forces armées américaines. Sur place, les Bellas découvrent rapidement qu'elles sont en compétition avec trois autres formations musicales pour assurer la première partie de DJ Khaled lors de sa future tournée en Europe.

programme.title: Shock Wave
programme.desc: A Hongkong, J.S. Cheung, officier de police spécialiste du déminage et des explosifs, a depuis longtemps infiltré le gang du redoutable Peng Hong, qui multiplie les braquages hautement préparés. Pour leur nouveau coup, les gangsters ont mis en place un dispositifs de taxis piégés, leur permettant de détourner l'attention des forces de l'ordre. Alors que les braqueurs sèment le chaos, Cheung, dans un de leurs véhicule, fait tout pour les empêcher de nuire. Ce faisant, il parvient à arrêter le jeune frère de Peng Hong alors que celui-ci parvient à prendre la fuite.

programme.title: L'échange des princesses
programme.desc: A Versailles, en 1712, le duc d'Anjou, jalousement veillé par madame de Ventadour, devient le nouvel héritier du trône après la mort du duc de Bretagne. En 1722, Louis XV, âgé de 11 ans, est de retour à Versailles, abandonné sept ans plus tôt. Philippe d'Orléans, régent soucieux d'assurer la paix du royaume, souhaite marier Louis XV avec l'infante d'Espagne, Maria Anna Victoria, âgée de 4 ans. Si l'adolescent accepte, Louise-Elisabeth, la fille de Philippe d'Orléans, se refuse, elle, à épouser le prince des Asturies.

programme.title: Un heureux événement
programme.desc: Etudiante en philosophie, Barbara Dray fait la connaissance de Nicolas Malle, qui travaille dans un vidéoclub. Il parvient à la séduire et ils s'installent ensemble. Lors de vacances, Nicolas convainc Barbara de faire un bébé. Un jour, la jeune femme annonce à Nicolas qu'elle est enceinte. Pendant sa grossesse, Barbara passe par tous les états. Et vient enfin le jour de l'accouchement, qui se déroule sans encombre. Mais c'est le début d'une véritable détresse pour Barbara, qui ne parvient pas à se faire à cette nouvelle vie.

programme.title: The Unusual Suspects
programme.desc: Sara, Evie, Roxanne, Amy et Birdie suivent les conseils de Rae pour mettre au point un plan solide pour s'emparer d'un collier qui vaut près de 16 millions de dollars.

programme.title: The Unusual Suspects
programme.desc: Evie et ses comparses découvrent qu'elles ont finalement été doublées, un mystérieux voleur s'est emparé du collier. En outre, la police est sur leurs traces.

programme.title: Rencontre à Hampstead Park
programme.desc: Emily Walters, une américaine, tient une petite boutique de vêtements à Hampstead Heath, un quartier bourgeois de Londres. Malgré les tentatives répétées de ses amies de lui trouver un nouveaux compagnon, la sexagénaire vit toujours seule depuis la mort de son mari Charles, un personnage infidèle qui la laissée endettée. Dans le même quartier, Donald Horner mène une existence bien différente, dans une petite cabane, vivant d'expédients. Mais celle-ci est menacée par l'arrivée d'un promoteur immobilier désireux de construire dans le quartier.

programme.title: Hashtag Boomer

programme.sub-title: S1 E8 Des couteaux et des strings

programme.title: Tais-toi !
programme.desc: Du fond de son cachot, Ruby, un cerveau du grand banditisme, ne songe qu'à se venger de son ancien patron, un truand qui a fait sauvagement abattre la femme qu'il aimait. Cet individu au caractère fort prépare méticuleusement son évasion. Mais son compagnon de cellule Quentin, un petit braqueur de banques, stupide et gentiment illuminé, s'est mis en tête de se faire la belle avec lui. Il espère même de devenir l'ami de Ruby.

programme.title: Late Night
programme.desc: Katherine Newbury, une présentatrice de talk show, est entourée d'auteurs masculins qu'elle tyrannise. Brad, son adjoint, lui conseille d'engager une plume féminine. Ce sera la positive Molly, d'origine indienne et dont l'unique expérience est d'écrire des blagues pour ses collègues d'un complexe chimique. Surnommée "huit" par sa nouvelle patronne, Molly fait ce qu'elle peut pour s'imposer. Entre-temps, la patronne de la chaîne annonce à Katherine qu'elle sera bientôt débarquée du show. Avec Molly et son équipe, celle-ci réussit à créer à nouveau le buzz autour de l'émission.

programme.title: Modern Murder : Parasomnie
programme.desc: Talia, une adolescente en proie à des visions, découvre le corps sans vie de Jürgen Bach, l'artisan qui rénovait la maison dans laquelle elle vit avec son père. La jeune fille a aperçu le meurtrier, et son témoignage devient incontournable pour faire avancer l'enquête des commissaires Winkler et Gorniak. Mais Talia a développé une autoprotection psychologique depuis la mort de sa mère sept ans auparavant et réprime ses visions horrifiques..

programme.title: Keeping Faith
programme.desc: Faith Howells, avocate en congé maternité, est mariée et associé dans le cabinet familial, à Evan. Un matin, son mari a disparu. Faith découvre que ce dernier menait une double vie.

programme.title: Keeping Faith
programme.desc: Faith n'a pas parlé à la police de la fausse carte d'identité au nom d'Alec Fenton ni de la perruque qu'elle a découvert. Elle apprend aussi qu'Evan n'allait plus à la boxe comme d'habitude chaque mercredi soir depuis 2 mois.

programme.title: Keeping Faith
programme.desc: Williams tente de rejeter toute la responsabilité de l'accident sur Faith. Et va jusqu'à employer des méthodes douteuses. De son côté, Delyth fait une découverte choquante dans le testament d'Evan. Terry, aidé par l'inspecteur Parry s'intéresse de près au docteur Alpay.

programme.title: Keeping Faith
programme.desc: Au tribunal, Faith se bat pour la garde de ses enfants au cours d'une audience très animée. Steve conclut un pacte avec ses anciens employeurs pour assurer la sécurité de l'avocate. Faith apprend finalement la vérité sur la disparition d'Evan..

programme.title: Meurtres à White House Farm
programme.desc: Après le témoignage à charge de Julie, Jeremy est arrêté chez lui et emmené au poste pour y être interrogé. Alors que tout semble réuni pour l'inculper des meurtres, le jeune homme parvient à redistribuer les cartes une nouvelle fois. Il demande à l'agent qui le surveille de transmettre un mot à Julie. Le papier est aussitôt remis aux policiers en charge de l'affaire. Ces quelques lignes viennent semer le doute et bouleverser l'enquête. Remis en liberté, Jeremy en profite pour s'enfuir sur la Côte d'Azur. Au sein de la police, les supérieurs de Stan Jones s'impatientent de voir l'enquête enfin aboutir..

Cinema Verite
programme.desc: Cinema Verite: Directed by Shari Springer Berman, Robert Pulcini. With Diane Lane, Tim Robbins, James Gandolfini, Thomas Dekker. A behind-the-scenes look at the making of the first American family to be the subjects of a reality TV show." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1623742/","name":"Cinema Verite","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMyNjU1MzE4Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTU0MjgxNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A behind-the-scenes look at the making of the first American family to be the subjects of a reality TV show.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1623742/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"cosmo_tiger"},"dateCreated":"2012-03-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"An interesting and enjoyable look at the beginnings of reality TV. Great acting and great movie. I recommend this. I say A-","reviewBody":""One must never let the public behind the scenes for they are easily disillusioned and then they are angry with you, for it is the illusion they love." The first successful reality show was on PBS and it was about the Loud family. The show followed around Pat (Lane) and Bill (Robbins) Loud and their family. It was the first of it's kind and this movie about how it started, what it was like while it was going on and the aftermath. I was actually pretty excited about watching this because of the cast. I have to say I was not disappointed at all. The acting was great in this and the movie itself was very entertaining. I have never been a fan of reality TV but it was very interesting to see how the genre began and the immediate impact that the show had. I do have to say though that as great as this movie is and how interesting it was to see the family problems come to the surface I still have no interest to watch the real "American Family" show. That in no way means that I did not enjoy watching the Loud family in this movie though. Overall, an excellent movie that should be watched. Very, very interesting and makes me wonder how accurate it is. I give it an A-.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3738,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2011-04-23","keywords":"reference to the rolling stones,reference to mick jagger,reference to andy warhol,reference to joe namath,reference to richard nixon","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Cinema Verite","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1027185945","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTg5NzEwNDY3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODczNTUyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTg5NzEwNDY3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODczNTUyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A behind-the-scenes look at the making of the first American family to be the subjects of a reality TV show. A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0317219/","name":"Cars","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5NzY0MzA2MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNDc3NTc2._V1_.jpg","description":"A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0317219/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Rectangular_businessman"},"dateCreated":"2007-01-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pixar keep the good line","reviewBody":"I found this movie to be enjoyable enough: Even when it is true that it wasn't at the same level than some of previous Pixar films (Such as "Toy Story" and "The Incredibles") it was a good film anyway, with an entertaining story and likable characters.

Despite the strangeness of the premise of a world inhabited by living cars, the execution is fairly convincing, with a neat character development and many funny and heartwarming moments.

Without being perfect, it managed to be something totally worth-watching from beginning to end, and in many ways this could be easily considered one of the best animated films from the year 2006 (Which was a terrible year, in my opinion)

A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0317219/","name":"Cars","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5NzY0MzA2MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNDc3NTc2._V1_.jpg","description":"A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0317219/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Rectangular_businessman","dateCreated":"2007-01-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pixar keep the good line","reviewBody":"I found this movie to be enjoyable enough: Even when it is true that it wasn't at the same level than some of previous Pixar films (Such as "Toy Story" and "The Incredibles") it was a good film anyway, with an entertaining story and likable characters.

Despite the strangeness of the premise of a world inhabited by living cars, the execution is fairly convincing, with a neat character development and many funny and heartwarming moments.

Without being perfect, it managed to be something totally worth-watching from beginning to end, and in many ways this could be easily considered one of the best animated films from the year 2006 (Which was a terrible year, in my opinion) 

7.5/10","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":391357,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1,"contentRating":"G","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2006-09-06","keywords":"car,car movie,route 66,truck,tow truck","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"How the Best Racing Films Raise the Stakes","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi365149977","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjgwYTRjOTMtZWIwMy00Nzc2LWJiMDMtMDFkMjRhYTYwY2VmXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFsZWxvZw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjgwYTRjOTMtZWIwMy00Nzc2LWJiMDMtMDFkMjRhYTYwY2VmXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFsZWxvZw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"On this IMDbrief, sponsored by Coca-Cola, we're putting the pedal to the metal on the best racing films of all time.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005562/","name":"Owen Wilson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001372/","name":"Bonnie Hunt","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000056/","name":"Paul Newman"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005124/","name":"John Lasseter","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0710020/","name":"Joe Ranft"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017902/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005124/","name":"John Lasseter","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0710020/","name":"Joe Ranft","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0460146/","name":"Jorgen Klubien"],"duration":"PT1H57M"</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: True Blood: Created by Alan Ball. With Anna Paquin, Stephen Moyer, Sam Trammell, Ryan Kwanten. Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0844441/","name":"True Blood","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDVjZDQ2N2MtMzMxYy00ZjliLTg5YjAtNjk1OTUwYjVjNWQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzA5NjUyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0844441/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"skip-98756"},"dateCreated":"2020-05-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Absolutely Superb and Unique Entry in this Genre!","reviewBody":"I just finished watching this amazing vampire series once again..I saw it when it 1st came out and hadnt watched it for a long time..I'd forgotton how it ended and alot of it was like watching for the first time again. This is some Very unique writing and not like any vampire,werewolf,witch show that you have ever seen before..It takes the very difficult path of mixing horror,gore,sexuality, intensity, drama,humor and satire all in one show and it does it extremely well! You feel a bond with each of the characters and there is a great deal of character development over the seasons, so much so that some of the characters become almost polar opposites of what they were when they were 1st introduced..Another fascinating twist is the Bizzare but also Wonderful change in the writing that occurs in the last season..its So Different that you wonder what the heck happenned! The whole tone of the show changes and yes this will disrupt Alot of viewers who expect a continuity of theme thru the show till its end....But....The change ,though radical, is also wonderful..I'd say there is Less humor, less satire, more Intensity, More seriousness in each actors acting which leads to a more dramatic feeling..The gore is still there but its Not as funny, its serious, its intense, and its heart breaking for so many of the characters and they all act it out so well.. Overall, that last season was like watching a Different show but it was Every bit as interesting and entertaining...Now thats something you Dont see very often! I love this show...Sexy,smart, dramatic, satirical and crazy funny at time, heartbreaking at others...What more could you ask of Any show in Any genre? The Final episode covers the full gamut of emotions and wraps things up in a beautiful ending that would bring a tear and a smile to anyone... highly recommended!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":236826,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2008-09-07","keywords":"human vampire relationship,vampire,witch,shapeshifter,bare breasts","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001593/","name":"Anna Paquin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0610459/","name":"Stephen Moyer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0870794/","name":"Sam Trammell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247237/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 7","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1494920473","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the full trailer for HBO's original series "True Blood"."}}</script><metacontent="

This is some Very unique writing and not like any vampire,werewolf,witch show that you have ever seen before..It takes the very difficult path of mixing horror,gore,sexuality, intensity, drama,humor and satire all in one show and it does it extremely well! You feel a bond with each of the characters and there is a great deal of character development over the seasons, so much so that some of the characters become almost polar opposites of what they were when they were 1st introduced..Another fascinating twist is the Bizzare but also Wonderful change in the writing that occurs in the last season..its So Different that you wonder what the heck happenned! The whole tone of the show changes and yes this will disrupt Alot of viewers who expect a continuity of theme thru the show till its end....But....The change ,though radical, is also wonderful..I'd say there is Less humor, less satire, more Intensity, More seriousness in each actors acting which leads to a more dramatic feeling..The gore is still there but its Not as funny, its serious, its intense, and its heart breaking for so many of the characters and they all act it out so well.. Overall, that last season was like watching a Different show but it was Every bit as interesting and entertaining...Now thats something you Dont see very often! I love this show...Sexy,smart, dramatic, satirical and crazy funny at time, heartbreaking at others...What more could you ask of Any show in Any genre? Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0844441/","name":"True Blood","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDVjZDQ2N2MtMzMxYy00ZjliLTg5YjAtNjk1OTUwYjVjNWQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzA5NjUyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0844441/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"skip-98756","dateCreated":"2020-05-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Absolutely Superb and Unique Entry in this Genre!","reviewBody":"I just finished watching this amazing vampire series once again..I saw it when it 1st came out and hadnt watched it for a long time..I'd forgotton how it ended and alot of it was like watching for the first time again. This is some Very unique writing and not like any vampire,werewolf,witch show that you have ever seen before..It takes the very difficult path of mixing horror,gore,sexuality, intensity, drama,humor and satire all in one show and it does it extremely well! You feel a bond with each of the characters and there is a great deal of character development over the seasons, so much so that some of the characters become almost polar opposites of what they were when they were 1st introduced..Another fascinating twist is the Bizzare but also Wonderful change in the writing that occurs in the last season..its So Different that you wonder what the heck happenned! The whole tone of the show changes and yes this will disrupt Alot of viewers who expect a continuity of theme thru the show till its end....But....The change ,though radical, is also wonderful..I'd say there is Less humor, less satire, more Intensity, More seriousness in each actors acting which leads to a more dramatic feeling..The gore is still there but its Not as funny, its serious, its intense, and its heart breaking for so many of the characters and they all act it out so well.. I love this show...Sexy,smart, dramatic, satirical and crazy funny at time, heartbreaking at others...What more could you ask of Any show in Any genre? IMDb data; ttnr: 0844441, Title: True Blood, --- Description: True Blood: Created by Alan Ball. With Anna Paquin, Stephen Moyer, Sam Trammell, Ryan Kwanten. Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0844441/","name":"True Blood","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDVjZDQ2N2MtMzMxYy00ZjliLTg5YjAtNjk1OTUwYjVjNWQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzA5NjUyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0844441/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"skip-98756","dateCreated":"2020-05-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Absolutely Superb and Unique Entry in this Genre!","reviewBody":"I just finished watching this amazing vampire series once again..I saw it when it 1st came out and hadnt watched it for a long time..I'd forgotton how it ended and alot of it was like watching for the first time again. This is some Very unique writing and not like any vampire,werewolf,witch show that you have ever seen before..It takes the very difficult path of mixing horror,gore,sexuality, intensity, drama,humor and satire all in one show and it does it extremely well! You feel a bond with each of the characters and there is a great deal of character development over the seasons, so much so that some of the characters become almost polar opposites of what they were when they were 1st introduced..Another fascinating twist is the Bizzare but also Wonderful change in the writing that occurs in the last season..its So Different that you wonder what the heck happenned! The whole tone of the show changes and yes this will disrupt Alot of viewers who expect a continuity of theme thru the show till its end....But....The change ,though radical, is also wonderful..I'd say there is Less humor, less satire, more Intensity, More seriousness in each actors acting which leads to a more dramatic feeling..The gore is still there but its Not as funny, its serious, its intense, and its heart breaking for so many of the characters and they all act it out so well.. Overall, that last season was like watching a Different show but it was Every bit as interesting and entertaining...Now thats something you Dont see very often! I love this show...Sexy,smart, dramatic, satirical and crazy funny at time, heartbreaking at others...What more could you ask of Any show in Any genre? The Final episode covers the full gamut of emotions and wraps things up in a beautiful ending that would bring a tear and a smile to anyone... highly recommended!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":236826,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2008-09-07","keywords":"human vampire relationship,vampire,witch,shapeshifter,bare breasts","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001593/","name":"Anna Paquin","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0610459/","name":"Stephen Moyer","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0870794/","name":"Sam Trammell"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247237/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 7","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1494920473","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the full trailer for HBO's original series "True Blood"."</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0248654, Title: Six Feet Under, --- Description: Six Feet Under: Created by Alan Ball. With Peter Krause, Michael C. Hall, Frances Conroy, Lauren Ambrose. A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0248654/","name":"Six Feet Under","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FmMjg0Y2YtYmMyYi00MTBjLTllYzMtN2VjYzRhOTVmNWRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDIzMzcwNjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0248654/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"alexkolokotronis","dateCreated":"2009-02-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"This Show Does The Impossible","reviewBody":"When using superlatives with this show it is totally fair. This show does something all other movies, shows, etc cannot do: it can safely apply any genre and still function as a deep and very entertaining show. As everybody episode goes by the show only becomes more addictive. It taps into almost every aspect of life. Every emotion is shown; love, hate, forgiveness, triumph and the list goes on and on. In fact this show depicts life the most realistically. The strangeness and peculiarity of the many themes perfectly displays the confusion in life and how it affects us. The show displays confusion in the clearest way making it almost impossible not to some how relate to the characters in the show. Not to mention also the series ends on one finest note you will ever see not just satisfying the viewer but taking the show to a level far and above anything else I have ever seen before. This show does the impossible twice over.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":127784,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2001-06-03","keywords":"funeral home,daydream,talking to the dead,husband wife relationship,boyfriend girlfriend relationship","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0470244/","name":"Peter Krause","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0355910/","name":"Michael C. programme.title: Elephant
Elephant
programme.desc:
Elephant: Directed by Gus Van Sant. With Alex Frost, Eric Deulen, John Robinson, Elias McConnell. Several ordinary high school students go through their daily routine as two others prepare for something more malevolent." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0363589/","name":"Elephant","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWRhNDZkMzQtZDQ3Ny00NjdjLWJmZjAtMWQxNDQyZTYzZjU0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Several ordinary high school students go through their daily routine as two others prepare for something more malevolent.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0363589/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"my_roman"},"dateCreated":"2004-09-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"All your comments are correct","reviewBody":"Depending on your point of view, this movie could have been boring or brilliant. For me, it was brilliant and disturbing. I get upset every time I see the interviews with the teens from columbine that day and want to cry every time i see the video's in the library. I didn't watch the entire film, i mostly listened to it. But that parts that I did watch were boring at first, then when I looked at it dramatically, they were amazing. even the simplist movements. I loved the style that the director filmed it visually and the time sequences.

I agree with the user that said that it showed how hopeless the children were. It shows the power of anyone with a motive and a gun. It's frightening to me. I'm in school right now and a bit scared. Anyone could be walking around with guns on them ready to shoot the school. If you've seen one of the Michael moore documentaries with the kid that has many guns hidden in his clothing, then you know how many weapons one can carry.

This movie opened my eyes though I wish it hadn't. Several ordinary high school students go through their daily routine as two others prepare for something more malevolent." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0363589/","name":"Elephant","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWRhNDZkMzQtZDQ3Ny00NjdjLWJmZjAtMWQxNDQyZTYzZjU0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Several ordinary high school students go through their daily routine as two others prepare for something more malevolent.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0363589/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"my_roman","dateCreated":"2004-09-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"All your comments are correct","reviewBody":"Depending on your point of view, this movie could have been boring or brilliant. For me, it was brilliant and disturbing. I get upset every time I see the interviews with the teens from columbine that day and want to cry every time i see the video's in the library. I didn't watch the entire film, i mostly listened to it. But that parts that I did watch were boring at first, then when I looked at it dramatically, they were amazing. even the simplist movements. I loved the style that the director filmed it visually and the time sequences.

I agree with the user that said that it showed how hopeless the children were. It shows the power of anyone with a motive and a gun. It's frightening to me. I'm in school right now and a bit scared. Anyone could be walking around with guns on them ready to shoot the school. If you've seen one of the Michael moore documentaries with the kid that has many guns hidden in his clothing, then you know how many weapons one can carry.

This movie opened my eyes though I wish it hadn't. It's frightening what can go on at any moment.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":89050,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2003-11-14","keywords":"violence,teenager,mass murder,high school shooting,held at gunpoint","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Elephant","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1000538393","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDIzYjAwMzEtODI3Yi00MzBjLThjMmQtMGZlZjUzZDZmNzlmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDIzYjAwMzEtODI3Yi00MzBjLThjMmQtMGZlZjUzZDZmNzlmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1371432/","name":"Elias McConnell","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1372713/","name":"Alex Frost","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1370494/","name":"Eric Deulen"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001814/","name":"Gus Van Sant"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005861/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043853/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0098753/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001814/","name":"Gus Van Sant"],"duration":"PT1H21M"</script><metacontent="

Dead Silence – Flammen in der Stille
programme.desc: Dead Silence: Directed by Daniel Petrie Jr.. With James Garner, Kim Coates, Marlee Matlin, Lolita Davidovich. A veteran FBI agent negotiates the release of a bus-load of hearing-impaired school-children taken hostage by 3 desperate escaped convicts." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0118942/","name":"Dead Silence","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzkwMjcxOTYyOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjU4ODc5ODE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A veteran FBI agent negotiates the release of a bus-load of hearing-impaired school-children taken hostage by 3 desperate escaped convicts.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0118942/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"daniel-kyle"},"dateCreated":"2010-03-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Garner is excellent; one of his best.","reviewBody":"I have always been a huge fan of James Garner. His movie work at times has been as good as his "Rockford Files" TV show, and this is one of the best examples. I was not familiar with the novel by Deaver on which it is based, but I will say that the story does not disappoint. The actors are all excellent, and there is a good deal of suspense. I disagree with some other reviews here on Garner's performance, as I bought the DVD largely because of his role. Another good movie he did near the same time was "Fire In The Sky", which fans should also check out. This movie was filmed in Canada, near where I live, and you can somehow always tell a Canadian production just by the look. Perhaps the portrayal of America never feels quite genuine.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1097,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1997-01-11","keywords":"police officer,scene of the crime,murder of a police officer,fbi federal bureau of investigation,child","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001258/","name":"James Garner"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0167649/","name":"Kim Coates"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0559144/","name":"Marlee Matlin"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0677943/","name":"Daniel Petrie Jr."}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0077387/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0031772/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0213281/","name":"Jeffery Deaver"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0829329/","name":"Donald E. A veteran FBI agent negotiates the release of a bus-load of hearing-impaired school-children taken hostage by 3 desperate escaped convicts." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0118942/","name":"Dead Silence","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzkwMjcxOTYyOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjU4ODc5ODE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A veteran FBI agent negotiates the release of a bus-load of hearing-impaired school-children taken hostage by 3 desperate escaped convicts.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0118942/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"daniel-kyle","dateCreated":"2010-03-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Garner is excellent; one of his best.","reviewBody":"I have always been a huge fan of James Garner. His movie work at times has been as good as his "Rockford Files" TV show, and this is one of the best examples. I was not familiar with the novel by Deaver on which it is based, but I will say that the story does not disappoint. The actors are all excellent, and there is a good deal of suspense. I disagree with some other reviews here on Garner's performance, as I bought the DVD largely because of his role. Another good movie he did near the same time was "Fire In The Sky", which fans should also check out. This movie was filmed in Canada, near where I live, and you can somehow always tell a Canadian production just by the look. Perhaps the portrayal of America never feels quite genuine.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1097,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1997-01-11","keywords":"police officer,scene of the crime,murder of a police officer,fbi federal bureau of investigation,child","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001258/","name":"James Garner","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0167649/","name":"Kim Coates","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0559144/","name":"Marlee Matlin"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0677943/","name":"Daniel Petrie Jr."],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0077387/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0031772/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0213281/","name":"Jeffery Deaver","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0829329/","name":"Donald E. programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 4270492, Title: Billions, --- Description: Billions: Created by Brian Koppelman, David Levien, Andrew Ross Sorkin. With Paul Giamatti, Maggie Siff, David Costabile, Condola Rashad. U.S. Attorney Chuck Rhoades goes after hedge fund king Bobby "Axe" Axelrod in a battle between two powerful New York figures." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt4270492/","name":"Billions","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmQ2MzM5OTEtZGE0Yy00ZGU4LWI4YmYtYmU2OTJkMDM4YjU2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTA3MTMyOTk@._V1_.jpg","description":"U.S. Attorney Chuck Rhoades goes after hedge fund king Bobby "Axe" Axelrod in a battle between two powerful New York figures.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4270492/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"feraldostephanie","dateCreated":"2016-04-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Worth The Title","reviewBody":"This is a must see. The writing, the acting, the cast, are all perfect. It is so rare that you find a show with such a diverse cast coming together so seamlessly. Each character is perfectly cast. The writing allows you to live each chactors journey throughout each scene. You do not know who's side you are on; all you know is they are all "right" in their convictions in some way. The tension and life within this show makes you feel it as though you are there. Re- watch to find details you may have missed the first time. It is a thriller, drama, comedy, tragedy, and fairytale all in one. Watch the show to find out which character resonates with you ethics and morals. The lines may be harder to see than you think. The cast are living their roles and their conviction is riveting. Thank you for this show.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":82938,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.4,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2016-01-01","keywords":"u.s. attorney,hedge fund,white collar crime,rivalry,profanity","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0316079/","name":"Paul Giamatti","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0507073/","name":"Damian Lewis","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1745019/","name":"Maggie Siff"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048667/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0695646/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002718/","name":"Brian Koppelman","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0505522/","name":"David Levien","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3376444/","name":"Andrew Ross Sorkin"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 6 - Official Teaser","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3918643993","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjk2MTU4NzEtNjQ5NC00ZDVmLWI3ZGUtMTQwOTRjNjFjNmM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQWFuaW5vc2M@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjk2MTU4NzEtNjQ5NC00ZDVmLWI3ZGUtMTQwOTRjNjFjNmM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQWFuaW5vc2M@._V1_.jpg","description":"U.S. Attorney Chuck Rhoades goes after hedge fund king Bobby "Axe" Axelrod in a battle between two powerful New York figures."</script><metacontent="

Xin Su shi jian: Directed by Tung-Shing Yee. With Jackie Chan, Naoto Takenaka, Daniel Wu, Jinglei Xu. A simple Chinese immigrant wages a perilous war against one of the most powerful criminal organizations on the planet." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1075419/","name":"Xin Su shi jian","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM2MTk5NzA2Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDU2MDQxMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A simple Chinese immigrant wages a perilous war against one of the most powerful criminal organizations on the planet.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1075419/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"lavalwong"},"dateCreated":"2009-07-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great movie","reviewBody":"This is a totally different style of movie that we are so used to see from Jackie. 

It is however a very touching story that i highly recommend to others to watch.

The movie is enticing all the way and the directory has done a fantastic job in his filming and story telling.

Given my background, i can very much identify with the characters in the movie.

Life is full of surprises, highs, lows, twists, irony, love, hate, joy, pride and all these are found in the movie.

Just loved it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12282,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2009-04-02","keywords":"gratitude,chinese,gang,japan,immigrant","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Shinjuku Incident","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2775648025","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjE4NmMzZDMtZTgxZC00NzQxLTkxOGMtN2YyYjNkY2MwN2Q2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjE4NmMzZDMtZTgxZC00NzQxLTkxOGMtN2YyYjNkY2MwN2Q2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for this Jackie Chan movie"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000329/","name":"Jackie Chan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0847562/","name":"Naoto Takenaka"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0943079/","name":"Daniel Wu"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0232504/","name":"Tung-Shing Yee"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0572618/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0232504/","name":"Tung-Shing Yee"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0161159/","name":"Tin-Nam Chun"}],"duration":"PT1H59M"}</script><metacontent="

District 9
programme.desc:
District 9: Directed by Neill Blomkamp. With Sharlto Copley, Jason Cope, Nathalie Boltt, Sylvaine Strike. Violence ensues after an extraterrestrial race forced to live in slum-like conditions on Earth finds a kindred spirit in a government agent exposed to their biotechnology." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1136608/","name":"District 9","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmQ5MzFjYWMtMTMwNC00ZGU5LWI3YTQtYzhkMGExNGFlY2Q0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Violence ensues after an extraterrestrial race forced to live in slum-like conditions on Earth finds a kindred spirit in a government agent exposed to their biotechnology.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1136608/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"moviesleuth2"},"dateCreated":"2009-09-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"A breath of fresh air in a time of bloated sequels and rip-offs!","reviewBody":"Ever since Neill Blomkamp was lined to do the film version of the "Halo" video game, he's become a household name with the fanboys. But as we all know, that project stalled and Blomkamp is no longer on board as a director. After that happened, Peter Jackson gave Blomkamp $30 million to make whatever movie he wanted. Blomkamp made this film, and it is a stunning debut.

Normally I despise remakes, but after viewing Blomkamp's short film, "Alive in Joburg," which served as the inspiration for this movie, I can say that calling "District 9" a remake of the short film is about as untrue as it is unfair. Even saying that Blomkamp used the short film as a jumping off point is pushing it (a lot). "District 9" takes the idea and runs with it, not even remembering to pass "Go" and collect 200 dollars.

South Africa, present day. A spaceship has been hovering over Johannesburg, South Africa, for the past 20 or so years. The aliens were brought down and nourished back to health, but people's apprehension with the new beings caused major clashes, and the visitors, known as "prawns" were moved into a slum called District 9. Today, the shady corporation Multi-National United has decided to move the prawns to District 10, and to make sure that it's handled legally, they enlist Wikus Van Der Merwe (Sharlto Copley) to oversee it. Suffice it to say, things don't go as planned.

"District 9" is not flawless, but it's so good that I'm more than willing to look the other way at any of its "flaws." But the best part of it is that it takes chances. In broad strokes, the story is familiar, but the details and execution are completely new.

One of the best things that I liked is how Blomkamp portrays people reacting to the aliens. Everything that the people do in response to them is completely credible. I don't want to give anything away, but the way that the people "acted" in response to the coming of the prawns is so believable it's almost chilling. "Interviews" with people who worked with Wikus and were involved in the story enhance this effect.

Meanwhile, we have Wikus guiding us through the story. Wikus is eager, but he's not the brightest bulb in the bunch. Sharlto Copley is excellent as Wikus. Copley does a great job playing a poster boy for MNU, but Wikus is also likable, and that's important.

"District 9" is a mixture of a million ideas all thrown together at once. Past movies have done this and sunk because of it, but "District 9" succeeds because they're competently explained and portrayed. A few technical things cause this to get an 8 instead of a 10 (for example, one scene is interesting, but it's out of place, and the film's big transition doesn't go very well), but it's still a highly recommendable film. And for once, the shaking camera is used effectively.

Do I think that Blomkamp should direct "Halo?" While there's no question that he could do it, and make a great movie out of the game, I don't think he's the right man for the job. I don't think "Halo" would look good as a grainy documentary. But that's just me.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":658294,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2009-12-23","keywords":"alien,social commentary,mockumentary,based on short film,removing fingernail","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"District 9: TV Spot","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3896050201","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc2NzE1MDA5Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTM4MDczMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc2NzE1MDA5Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTM4MDczMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A TV trailer for District 9"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1663205/","name":"Sharlto Copley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3107870/","name":"David James"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2271261/","name":"Jason Cope"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0088955/","name":"Neill Blomkamp"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005883/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0286672/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046203/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0088955/","name":"Neill Blomkamp"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2833612/","name":"Terri Tatchell"}],"duration":"PT1H52M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Wrong Turn
Wrong Turn
programme.desc:
Wrong Turn: Directed by Rob Schmidt. With Desmond Harrington, Eliza Dushku, Emmanuelle Chriqui, Jeremy Sisto. Chris and a group of five friends are left stranded deep in the middle of the woods after their cars collide. As they venture deeper into the woods, they face an uncertain and bloodcurdling fate." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0295700/","name":"Wrong Turn","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQwMTkyMTY4M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMDc0NDE3._V1_.jpg","description":"Chris and a group of five friends are left stranded deep in the middle of the woods after their cars collide. As they venture deeper into the woods, they face an uncertain and bloodcurdling fate.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0295700/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Li-1"},"dateCreated":"2004-11-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"A slasher that needs more...well, everything!","reviewBody":"Rating: ** out of ****

Wrong Turn seemingly has all the ingredients necessary for an effective slasher: a good setting and decent premise, a very attractive and likable cast, memorable make-up and gore effect, and a refreshingly unironic tone that reminds us of the days when old-fashioned horror didn't rely on self-conscious humor to pass for entertainment value. In that manner, Wrong Turn is actually a little nostalgic, not unlike the rest of the recent batch of backwoods horror flicks (Cabin Fever, House of 1000 Corpses, and the Texas Chainsaw Massacre remake).

But aside from two solid setpieces, the movie rarely fulfills its (admittedly limited) potential. The script matters little in this subgenre, but there's almost no plot after the ill-fated teens arrive at the mountain men's cabin. This is about twenty-five minutes into the film, after we've already dispensed with the obligatory character intros (basically: 3 hot chicks and 3 hunky, but also surprisingly personable guys) and whatever reasons they have for being stranded in the middle of nowhere, West Virginia.

Everything after that is typical cat-and-mouse filler, the killers (three inbred, cannibalistic hillbillies) searching for their prey while our protagonists run and hide behind trees. There's very little in the way of suspense, namely because it's so obvious who's going to live and who's going to die and in what order. And because the cast is so small, you can't even enjoy a particularly large body count (half the main cast is killed off less than forty minutes into the picture).

Wrong Turn is also missing much of what makes slasher movies fun to watch: explicit nudity and the occasional bit of gratuitous sex. With such an attractive cast (Emmanuelle Chriqui is cute, and Eliza Dushku and especially Lindy Booth are total hotties), the movie regrettably skimps on the goods. Such a complaint probably wouldn't matter if the characters were better developed, but despite a talented cast, the most interesting aspect character-wise is noting how different a couple Lindy Booth and Kevin Zegers played in Dawn of the Dead. 

As for the rest of the cast, Desmond Harrington is a solid actor, but does little more than run, grunt, and dive headfirst into every dangerous stunt (his volunteering for every dangerous move actually makes him pretty likable even when we question his logic). Eliza Dushku simply coasts on her looks (and proves that all hottie TV actresses are destined to play a big screen scream queen at least once in their lives), while Emmanuelle Chriqui just shrieks her way through her part. Standing out a little is Jeremy Sisto, who infuses a bit of humor into an otherwise very disposable role.

The forest is something of a disappointment, as well. With a potentially excellent setting at his disposal, director Rob Schmidt fails to generate any creepy atmosphere in an environment where you'd think atmosphere would almost come naturally (to be fair, a lot of horror movies also seem to have this problem; the last time I saw a forest setting utilized perfectly was in 2003's terrifically frightening Dead End). 

Despite the fact I've done little more than harp on the film, there's no denying that the middle half-hour is occasionally entertaining. There's a semi-suspenseful scene set in a vehicular junkyard (finally, a little variety in setting, huh?) and another effective sequence set inside a watchtower that segues to an exciting chase atop the branches of some very large trees. The murders are too sparse, given the small cast, but they're gruesome and memorable, and thankfully not as relentlessly cruel as the deaths in Cabin Fever, but boast just the right touch of menace and hard-edged violence.

The three hillbilly killers aren't quite as successful as the gore; in fact, seeing less of them would have been appreciated, considering their grotesque appearance almost crosses into the realm of self-parody. Even The X-Files knew better than that. 

Anyway, whatever momentum the middle half-hour built up comes crashing down in the final minutes, with the film actually closing out with an explosion, surely a sign of desperation on the part of the screenwriter if he can't come up with any brighter ideas in a slasher (I was, in fact, about to give the movie a ** 1/2 until the climax). Overall, this is mildly recommended to slasher fans or anyone who wants to gawk at Dushku for a little over an hour. Wrong Turn at least has its heart set in the right place, which is more than can be said for most slashers these days."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":115839,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2004-04-07","keywords":"west virginia,bound and gagged,voyeur,voyeurism,flat tire","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Wrong Turn","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1946026265","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDY3YjZjODQtMzNkZC00ZTZjLTg2NTMtN2UyN2NiNTk1ZTkzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDY3YjZjODQtMzNkZC00ZTZjLTg2NTMtN2UyN2NiNTk1ZTkzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Pre, "Coming Soon""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0244630/","name":"Eliza Dushku"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004825/","name":"Emmanuelle Chriqui"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003343/","name":"Rob Schmidt"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046206/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002257/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0029749/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0568416/","name":"Alan B. McElroy"}],"duration":"PT1H24M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Beyond the Law
Beyond the Law
programme.desc: Beyond the Law: Directed by James Cullen Bressack. With Johnny Messner, Steven Seagal, DMX, Bill Cobbs. programme.title: Hell on the Border
Hell on the Border
programme.desc: Hell on the Border: Directed by Wes Miller. With David Gyasi, Ron Perlman, Frank Grillo, Manu Intiraymi. Arkansas, 1875, After shooting 5 men to save a judge and then going into Indian Territory after a lethal outlaw, Bass Reeves becomes the first black deputy marshal west of Mississippi." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8652584/","name":"Hell on the Border","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzdiMDI0NDItMzdjOC00MzQwLWEwZGUtN2JjZDBkYmU3YjNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjA3MzE2ODE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Arkansas, 1875, After shooting 5 men to save a judge and then going into Indian Territory after a lethal outlaw, Bass Reeves becomes the first black deputy marshal west of Mississippi.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8652584/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"daithiosioradain"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Lame amateurish production unworthy of the true story","reviewBody":"Where to start with the issues? Buildings with beautifully fresh and smoothly sawn walls, houses with aluminium roofs, six shooters that didn't need reloading, disjointed action sequences moving at glacial speeds...... Camerawork was crude, used jerkiness and lens flare etc to no benefit. One of the worst films I've seen in the last year, this was inconsistent, uneven, unrealistic and frankly has nothing to commend it except that it chose a story that should be told. Avoid.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1337,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Adventure","Biography","Western"],"datePublished":"2019-12-13","keywords":"shooting,shooting a gun into the air,n word,fort smith arkansas,public execution","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Hell On The Border","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2369634073","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWEzNzIyYmMtN2YwYy00ZGZkLTkwNDctY2RkMDk1ZDBjYWM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWEzNzIyYmMtN2YwYy00ZGZkLTkwNDctY2RkMDk1ZDBjYWM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1408543/","name":"David Gyasi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000579/","name":"Ron Perlman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0342029/","name":"Frank Grillo"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5090040/","name":"Wes Miller"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0439538/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0333376/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0817147/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5090040/","name":"Wes Miller"}],"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ironclad
Ironclad – Bis zum letzten Krieger
programme.desc:
Ironclad: Directed by Jonathan English. With James Purefoy, Brian Cox, Kate Mara, Derek Jacobi. In thirteenth-century England, a Knights Templar and a few of the Barons men fight to defend Rochester Castle against the tyrannical King John." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1233301/","name":"Ironclad","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI1NTU2NTI5NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDYzOTI1NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In thirteenth-century England, a Knights Templar and a few of the Barons men fight to defend Rochester Castle against the tyrannical King John.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1233301/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"intelearts"},"dateCreated":"2011-07-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"437th Review: Blood and Valour (But mostly blood)","reviewBody":"Definitely shot in a Ridley Scott fashion this is an effective medieval pot-boiler with some moral vision and lots and lots of gruesome full-on combat scenes - without a doubt some of the more bone-crunching, blood squelching fights of recent memory.

Is a great movie? No. It never quite delivers on its promise, and though extremely competent it just can't quite produce that true magic that better films can. It is, however, a highly competent and interesting historical drama. I have some quibbles with costuming etc; but that kind of goes with the territory.

All in all, this is a full-on medieval siege account of the Siege of Rochester -it is well made is most respects and if medieval battles are your thing then you'll be into it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":41376,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2011-03-04","keywords":"13th century,england,knight,castle,king","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Ironclad","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4273052697","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU1Mzk5NDgxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjIxNTI1NQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU1Mzk5NDgxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjIxNTI1NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the 13th century, a determined group of Knights Templar defends Rochester Castle against the tyrannical King John. programme.desc:
Xin Su shi jian: Directed by Tung-Shing Yee. With Jackie Chan, Naoto Takenaka, Daniel Wu, Jinglei Xu. A simple Chinese immigrant wages a perilous war against one of the most powerful criminal organizations on the planet." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1075419/","name":"Xin Su shi jian","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM2MTk5NzA2Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDU2MDQxMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A simple Chinese immigrant wages a perilous war against one of the most powerful criminal organizations on the planet.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1075419/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"lavalwong"},"dateCreated":"2009-07-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great movie","reviewBody":"This is a totally different style of movie that we are so used to see from Jackie. 

It is however a very touching story that i highly recommend to others to watch.

The movie is enticing all the way and the directory has done a fantastic job in his filming and story telling.

Given my background, i can very much identify with the characters in the movie.

Life is full of surprises, highs, lows, twists, irony, love, hate, joy, pride and all these are found in the movie.

Just loved it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12282,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2009-04-02","keywords":"gratitude,chinese,gang,japan,immigrant","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Shinjuku Incident","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2775648025","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjE4NmMzZDMtZTgxZC00NzQxLTkxOGMtN2YyYjNkY2MwN2Q2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjE4NmMzZDMtZTgxZC00NzQxLTkxOGMtN2YyYjNkY2MwN2Q2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for this Jackie Chan movie"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000329/","name":"Jackie Chan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0847562/","name":"Naoto Takenaka"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0943079/","name":"Daniel Wu"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0232504/","name":"Tung-Shing Yee"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0572618/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0232504/","name":"Tung-Shing Yee"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0161159/","name":"Tin-Nam Chun"}],"duration":"PT1H59M"}</script><metacontent="

A simple Chinese immigrant wages a perilous war against one of the most powerful criminal organizations on the planet." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1075419/","name":"Xin Su shi jian","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM2MTk5NzA2Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDU2MDQxMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A simple Chinese immigrant wages a perilous war against one of the most powerful criminal organizations on the planet.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1075419/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"lavalwong","dateCreated":"2009-07-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great movie","reviewBody":"This is a totally different style of movie that we are so used to see from Jackie.

programme.title: Free Guy
Free Guy
programme.desc: Free Guy: Directed by Shawn Levy. With Ryan Reynolds, Jodie Comer, Lil Rel Howery, Joe Keery. A bank teller discovers that he's actually an NPC inside a brutal, open world video game." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6264654/","name":"Free Guy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTY2NzFjODctOWUzMC00MGZhLTlhNjMtM2Y2ODBiNGY1ZWRiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDM2NDM2MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A bank teller discovers that he's actually an NPC inside a brutal, open world video game.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6264654/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"SnoopyStyle"},"dateCreated":"2021-09-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"fun guy","reviewBody":"Guy (Ryan Reynolds) is a bank teller and Buddy (Lil Rel Howery) is his best friend. He's actually an NPC (non-player character) in Free City, an online video game. He goes through every day doing the same thing and getting robbed multiple times. One day, he spots Molotovgirl (Jodie Comer) and his world view expands. In the real world, she is Millie suing Antwan (Taika Waititi) for stealing her code. She is in the game trying to find proof of that theft.\n\nIt's a good idea but it's Ryan Reynolds who makes this good. He is the fun guy. He makes this fun. I do have a couple of problems with the movie. The security guy at the secret stash should be an NPC. At that point in the story, he should start convincing the other NPCs to help him outside of their programming. Also, there's no reason why the evidence is stashed in a room in the game. I get that it makes it easier but it makes no sense. All that is a little besides the point, it's Reynolds and he's the fun guy.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":199847,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2021-08-12","keywords":"artificial intelligence,bank robbery,video game world,npc,two word title","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"New Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3038887961","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzE5NDg2YmMtYjc0Yy00NWRmLWJiYTctNjQ2NzdkODEwMDQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzE5NDg2YmMtYjc0Yy00NWRmLWJiYTctNjQ2NzdkODEwMDQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"In 'Free Guy,' a bank teller who discovers he is actually a background player in an open-world video game, decides to become the hero of his own story...one he rewrites himself. Now in a world where there are no limits, he is determined to be the guy who saves his world his way...before it is too late."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005351/","name":"Ryan Reynolds"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3069650/","name":"Jodie Comer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0169806/","name":"Taika Waititi"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0506613/","name":"Shawn Levy"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0781821/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0330789/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0158853/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1073238/","name":"Matt Lieberman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0672015/","name":"Zak Penn"}],"duration":"PT1H55M"}</script><metacontent="
